tool.name: remove_tail.py
tool.description:
Remove a certain number of nucleotides from the 3'-tails of sequences in fastq format.
Example usage: - remove the last 7 nucleotides from file input.fastq, write result to file output.fastq: remove_tail.py input.fastq 7 --out output.fastq
tool.command:
remove_tail.py #if $positional_1 and $positional_1 is not None: $positional_1 #end if
#if $positional_2 and $positional_2 is not None: $positional_2 #end if
#if $outfile and $outfile is not None: --outfile $outfile #end if $verbose $debug > $default
